name: Render
description: Integrate with Render to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Services
tools.description: List all services in the Render account. Returns service names, types, regions, and statuses.

tools.name: Get Service
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Render service by its ID.

tools.name: List Deploys
tools.description: List recent deploys for a Render service. Returns deploy IDs, statuses, commit info, and timestamps.

tools.name: Trigger Deploy
tools.description: Trigger a new deploy for a Render service. Optionally clear the build cache.

tools.name: List Envs
tools.description: List environment variables for a Render service. Sensitive values are masked.
